txt.en: DNT - Defeated attacking orcs in Tharbad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mayor Cadwallon Nevit has asked you to defeat Orcs among the ruins of Tharbad.\n\nTharbad is located in south-west Cardolan.
DNT - 'So, you made it back, I see. You have my thanks. One day, Tharbad will be ours once more.'
Orcs have infested the ruins of the ancient city of Tharbad. Cadwallon Nevit, Mayor of Herne, will not allow this defilement to continue!
DNT - Defeat attacking orcs in Tharbad ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the ears to Mayor Nevit
DNT - You have discovered the missing Mayor, but he is under attack by vicious Orcs! You should defeat the Orcs and rescue the Mayor.\n\nThe Mayor is in Tharbad, in southeast Cardolan.
DNT - Talk to Mayor Cadwallon Nevit
DNT - 'Bah! The villains came upon me while I was unawares. I would have been fine.'
'So, you made it back, I see. You have my thanks. One day, Tharbad will be ours once more.'
You should bring the severed Orc ears to Mayor Cadwallon Nevit.\n\nMayor Nevit has returned to Herne, in central Cardolan.
DNT - You have defended and rescued the wayward Mayor, TBD. You should talk to the Mayor and let him know his daughter is waiting for him.\n\nMayor TBD is in Tharbad, in southeast Cardolan.

'I was on my way back to Herne when those accursed fools attacked me. I have seen what I came here to see, so I will make my way back and meet you there.\n\n'No! I do not need your help getting back - a friend will be arriving to bring me home. However, you could put those skills of yours to work in another way. Drive out the Orcs who have infiltrated Tharbad. If you survive, return to me in Herne with their ears when you have finished, and I shall reward you.'
